input.sentences: we were looking forward to visiting the nature preserve on our trip .
the paths were all lines with moss covered trees and various types of ferns .
we came across this small waterfall while exploring the woods .
the stream was bubbling over from the recent melting of the winter snows .
it was nice to find a place to stop and sit and rest after exploring for several hours .
